Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by attributing a quote to Nancy Pelosi that she never actually said.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks support as there is no evidence or credible sources to back up the quote attributed to Pelosi.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Pelosi supports longer emergency room wait times, which is not supported by any evidence.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Pelosi never made the statement attributed to her.
